channel.title: CVE Feed for Talos -- Moxa
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Talos -- Moxa

item.title: CVE-2017-12126|2024-09-16T16:53:59.341Z -- talos -- moxa
item.description: An exploitable cross-site request forgery vulnerability exists in the web server functionality of Moxa EDR-810 V4.1 build 17030317. A specially crafted HTTP packet can cause cross-site request forgery. An attacker can create malicious HTML to trigger this vulnerability.

item.title: CVE-2017-14434|2024-09-16T22:45:13.801Z -- talos -- moxa
item.description: An exploitable command injection vulnerability exists in the web server functionality of Moxa EDR-810 V4.1 build 17030317. A specially crafted HTTP POST can cause a privilege escalation resulting in root shell. An attacker can inject OS commands into the remoteNetmask0= parameter in the "/goform/net\_Web\_get_value" uri to trigger this vulnerability.

item.title: CVE-2016-8717|2024-09-16T17:09:11.126Z -- talos -- moxa
item.description: An exploitable Use of Hard-coded Credentials vulnerability exists in the Moxa AWK-3131A Wireless Access Point running firmware 1.1. The device operating system contains an undocumented, privileged (root) account with hard-coded credentials, giving attackers full control of affected devices.

item.title: CVE-2017-12128|2024-09-16T20:59:00.866Z -- talos -- moxa
item.description: An exploitable information disclosure vulnerability exists in the Server Agent functionality of Moxa EDR-810 V4.1 build 17030317. A specially crafted TCP packet can cause information disclosure. An attacker can send a crafted TCP packet to trigger this vulnerability.

item.title: CVE-2017-12120|2024-09-16T16:33:59.260Z -- talos -- moxa
item.description: An exploitable command injection vulnerability exists in the web server functionality of Moxa EDR-810 V4.1 build 17030317. A specially crafted HTTP POST can cause a privilege escalation, resulting in a root shell. An attacker can inject OS commands into the ip= parm in the "/goform/net_WebPingGetValue" URI to trigger this vulnerability.

item.title: CVE-2017-12121|2024-09-16T18:13:49.032Z -- talos -- moxa
item.description: An exploitable command injection vulnerability exists in the web server functionality of Moxa EDR-810 V4.1 build 17030317. A specially crafted HTTP POST can cause a privilege escalation resulting in root shell. An attacker can inject OS commands into the rsakey\_name= parm in the "/goform/WebRSAKEYGen" uri to trigger this vulnerability.

item.title: CVE-2017-12125|2024-09-16T19:00:52.724Z -- talos -- moxa
item.description: An exploitable command injection vulnerability exists in the web server functionality of Moxa EDR-810 V4.1 build 17030317. A specially crafted HTTP POST can cause a privilege escalation resulting in root shell. An attacker can inject OS commands into the CN= parm in the "/goform/net_WebCSRGen" uri to trigger this vulnerability.

item.title: CVE-2017-14437|2024-09-16T22:45:06.262Z -- talos -- moxa
item.description: An exploitable denial of service vulnerability exists in the web server functionality of Moxa EDR-810 V4.1 build 17030317. A specially crafted HTTP URI can cause a null pointer dereference resulting in denial of service. An attacker can send a GET request to "/MOXA\_LOG.ini" without a cookie header to trigger this vulnerability.

item.title: CVE-2017-14432|2024-09-16T17:54:38.060Z -- talos -- moxa
item.description: An exploitable command injection vulnerability exists in the web server functionality of Moxa EDR-810 V4.1 build 17030317. A specially crafted HTTP POST can cause a privilege escalation resulting in root shell. An attacker can inject OS commands into the openvpnServer0_tmp= parameter in the "/goform/net\_Web\_get_value" uri to trigger this vulnerability.

item.title: CVE-2017-12123|2024-09-16T22:35:55.803Z -- talos -- moxa
item.description: An exploitable clear text transmission of password vulnerability exists in the web server and telnet functionality of Moxa EDR-810 V4.1 build 17030317. An attacker can look at network traffic to get the admin password for the device. The attacker can then use the credentials to login as admin.

item.title: CVE-2017-14435|2024-09-16T17:38:22.584Z -- talos -- moxa
item.description: An exploitable denial of service vulnerability exists in the web server functionality of Moxa EDR-810 V4.1 build 17030317. A specially crafted HTTP URI can cause a null pointer dereference resulting in denial of service. An attacker can send a GET request to "/MOXA\_CFG.ini" without a cookie header to trigger this vulnerability.
